here is the documentation for the api 

Public Profile Posts


GET
/api/profiles/{displayLink}/posts
Get public posts for a specific account/profile


Retrieve public posts for any account by their display link (username).

Content & Performance Rules:
Maximum 7 posts per request for optimal performance
Markdown Support: Content supports rich formatting with safe HTML output
Free public posts: Full content and media visible to everyone
Subscriber text posts: Content truncated to 150 chars + "Subscribe to read more"
Subscriber audio/video: Shows metadata and duration but no actual media file
Unpublished/moderated posts: Hidden from public view
Banned accounts: No posts returned
Markdown Features:
Plain text compatible: No markdown knowledge required
Rich formatting: **bold**, *italic*, # headings, - lists, [links](url)
5,000 character limit per post (increased from 2,500)
Safe HTML output: All content sanitized for security
Pagination Best Practices:
Use offset and limit for pagination
Performance Note: Large offset values (>1000) may be slower
Consider caching results on client side
Use next_offset and prev_offset from response for easy navigation
Post Ordering:
Pinned posts first (both free and subscriber)
Free public posts by custom display order (1-5)
Subscriber posts by publication date (newest first)
Rate Limiting:
100 requests per 15 minutes per IP address (geo-based)
Stricter limits may apply based on server load
Parameters
Try it out
Name	Description
displayLink *
string
(path)
The account's username/display link

Example : johncreator

johncreator
limit
integer
(query)
Number of posts to return (max 7 for performance)

Default value : 7

Example : 7

7
offset
integer
(query)
Number of posts to skip for pagination

Default value : 0

Example : 0

0
tierFilter
string
(query)
Filter posts by tier

Available values : free, subscriber, all

Default value : all

Example : all


all

Perfect! Now I'll create the comprehensive user posts system with all the components. Let me start by creating the API service:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api.tsx
import { axiosInstance } from '@/lib/axios';

export interface PostMedia {
  post_id: string;
  content: string;
  content_length: number;
  media_url?: string;
  media_type?: 'image' | 'video' | 'audio';
  video_link_url?: string;
  video_link_platform?: 'youtube' | 'tiktok' | 'twitter' | 'instagram';
  post_tier: 'free' | 'subscriber';
  is_public: boolean;
  is_subscriber_only: boolean;
  is_preview: boolean;
  subscriber_content_type?: 'image' | 'video' | 'audio' | 'text';
  preview_message?: string;
  display_name: string;
  display_link: string;
  published_at: string;
  is_pinned: boolean;
}

export interface AccountInfo {
  display_name: string;
  display_link: string;
  profile_image_url?: string;
}

export interface PostsPagination {
  limit: number;
  offset: number;
  total_posts: number;
  total_pages: number;
  current_page: number;
  posts_returned: number;
  has_next_page: boolean;
  has_prev_page: boolean;
  next_offset: number | null;
  prev_offset: number | null;
}

export interface PostsResponse {
  account: AccountInfo;
  posts: PostMedia[];
  pagination: PostsPagination;
}

export interface PostsApiParams {
  displayLink: string;
  limit?: number;
  offset?: number;
  tierFilter?: 'free' | 'subscriber' | 'all';
}

export const userPostsApi = {
  /**
   * Fetch public posts for a specific account/profile
   */
  async getPosts(params: PostsApiParams): Promise<PostsResponse> {
    const { displayLink, limit = 7, offset = 0, tierFilter = 'all' } = params;
    
    try {
      const response = await axiosInstance.get(`/api/profiles/${displayLink}/posts`, {
        params: {
          limit,
          offset,
          tierFilter
        }
      });
      
      return response.data;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching posts:', error);
      throw error;
    }
  },

  /**
   * Check if more posts are available
   */
  hasMorePosts(pagination: PostsPagination): boolean {
    return pagination.has_next_page;
  },

  /**
   * Get next page parameters
   */
  getNextPageParams(pagination: PostsPagination, currentParams: PostsApiParams): PostsApiParams | null {
    if (!pagination.has_next_page || pagination.next_offset === null) {
      return null;
    }

    return {
      ...currentParams,
      offset: pagination.next_offset
    };
  }
};
```

Now let me create the individual post components. I'll start with the base post container:

```typescript:src/components/posts/PostContainer.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Avatar, Chip } from '@mui/material';
import { format } from 'date-fns';
import PushPinIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PushPin';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';

interface PostContainerProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

export default function PostContainer({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null,
  children 
}: PostContainerProps) {
  
  const formatDate = (dateString: string) => {
    try {
      return format(new Date(dateString), 'MMM d, yyyy');
    } catch {
      return 'Invalid date';
    }
  };

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      background: 'linear-gradient(156.52deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4) 2.12%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0001) 39%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0001) 54.33%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 93.02%)',
      backdropFilter: 'blur(50px)',
      WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(50px)',
      borderRadius: '24px',
      border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
      boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
      p: 3,
      mb: 3,
      position: 'relative',
      overflow: 'hidden',
      transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out',
      '&:hover': {
        transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
        boxShadow: '0 12px 40px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.2)',
      }
    }}>
      
      {/* Pinned Badge */}
      {post.is_pinned && (
        <Box sx={{ 
          position: 'absolute',
          top: 16,
          right: 16,
          zIndex: 2
        }}>
          <Chip
            icon={<PushPinIcon sx={{ fontSize: '16px !important' }} />}
            label="Pinned"
            size="small"
            sx={{
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.9)',
              color: '#000',
              fontWeight: 600,
              fontSize: '0.75rem',
              '& .MuiChip-icon': {
                color: '#000'
              }
            }}
          />
        </Box>
      )}

      {/* Post Header */}
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        mb: 2,
        pr: post.is_pinned ? 6 : 0
      }}>
        <Avatar
          src={`/images/profiles/${Math.floor(Math.random() * 32) + 1}.jpg`}
          alt={post.display_name}
          sx={{
            width: 40,
            height: 40,
            mr: 2,
            border: '2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)'
          }}
        />
        <Box sx={{ flex: 1 }}>
          <Typography
            variant="subtitle1"
            fontWeight={600}
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {post.display_name}
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="caption"
            sx={{
              color: textColor ? `${textColor}CC` : 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
              textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {formatDate(post.published_at)}
          </Typography>
        </Box>
        
        {/* Post Tier Badge */}
        <Chip
          label={post.post_tier === 'free' ? 'Free' : 'Premium'}
          size="small"
          sx={{
            backgroundColor: post.post_tier === 'free' 
              ? 'rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.8)' 
              : 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.8)',
            color: '#fff',
            fontWeight: 500,
            fontSize: '0.7rem'
          }}
        />
      </Box>

      {/* Post Content */}
      {children}
    </Box>
  );
}
```

Now let me create specific post components for different content types:

```typescript:src/components/posts/TextPost.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography } from '@mui/material';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';
import PostContainer from './PostContainer';

interface TextPostProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function TextPost({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null 
}: TextPostProps) {
  
  const renderContent = () => {
    if (post.is_preview && post.subscriber_content_type === 'text') {
      return (
        <Box>
          <Typography
            variant="body1"
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
              lineHeight: 1.6,
              mb: 2
            }}
            dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
          />
          <Box sx={{
            p: 2,
            borderRadius: '12px',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.1)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.3)',
            textAlign: 'center'
          }}>
            <Typography
              variant="body2"
              sx={{
                color: '#FFA726',
                fontWeight: 500,
                fontStyle: 'italic'
              }}
            >
              {post.preview_message || 'Subscribe to read more'}
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    return (
      <Typography
        variant="body1"
        sx={{
          color: textColor || '#ffffff',
          textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
          lineHeight: 1.6,
          '& p': { mb: 1 },
          '& h1, & h2, & h3, & h4, & h5, & h6': { 
            mb: 1, 
            fontWeight: 'bold',
            color: textColor || '#ffffff'
          },
          '& ul, & ol': { pl: 2, mb: 1 },
          '& li': { mb: 0.5 },
          '& a': { 
            color: '#64B5F6',
            textDecoration: 'underline',
            '&:hover': { color: '#42A5F5' }
          }
        }}
        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
      />
    );
  };

  return (
    <PostContainer 
      post={post} 
      backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
      backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
      textColor={textColor}
    >
      {renderContent()}
    </PostContainer>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/components/posts/ImagePost.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Dialog, IconButton } from '@mui/material';
import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';
import PostContainer from './PostContainer';

interface ImagePostProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function ImagePost({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null 
}: ImagePostProps) {
  const [lightboxOpen, setLightboxOpen] = useState(false);

  const renderContent = () => {
    if (post.is_preview && post.subscriber_content_type === 'image') {
      return (
        <Box>
          {post.content && (
            <Typography
              variant="body1"
              sx={{
                color: textColor || '#ffffff',
                textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
                lineHeight: 1.6,
                mb: 2
              }}
              dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
            />
          )}
          <Box sx={{
            position: 'relative',
            borderRadius: '16px',
            overflow: 'hidden',
            mb: 2,
            filter: 'blur(8px)',
            opacity: 0.6
          }}>
            <img
              src={post.media_url}
              alt="Preview"
              style={{
                width: '100%',
                height: 'auto',
                maxHeight: '400px',
                objectFit: 'cover'
              }}
            />
            <Box sx={{
              position: 'absolute',
              top: '50%',
              left: '50%',
              transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
              textAlign: 'center',
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)',
              padding: '16px',
              borderRadius: '12px'
            }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="white" fontWeight={600}>
                üîí Premium Content
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{
            p: 2,
            borderRadius: '12px',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.1)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.3)',
            textAlign: 'center'
          }}>
            <Typography
              variant="body2"
              sx={{
                color: '#FFA726',
                fontWeight: 500,
                fontStyle: 'italic'
              }}
            >
              {post.preview_message || 'Subscribe to view full image'}
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    return (
      <Box>
        {post.content && (
          <Typography
            variant="body1"
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
              lineHeight: 1.6,
              mb: 2
            }}
            dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
          />
        )}
        <Box
          sx={{
            borderRadius: '16px',
            overflow: 'hidden',
            cursor: 'pointer',
            transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out',
            '&:hover': {
              transform: 'scale(1.02)'
            }
          }}
          onClick={() => setLightboxOpen(true)}
        >
          <img
            src={post.media_url}
            alt={post.display_name}
            style={{
              width: '100%',
              height: 'auto',
              maxHeight: '600px',
              objectFit: 'cover'
            }}
          />
        </Box>
      </Box>
    );
  };

  return (
    <>
      <PostContainer 
        post={post} 
        backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
        backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
        textColor={textColor}
      >
        {renderContent()}
      </PostContainer>

      {/* Image Lightbox */}
      <Dialog
        open={lightboxOpen}
        onClose={() => setLightboxOpen(false)}
        maxWidth="lg"
        fullWidth
        sx={{
          '& .MuiDialog-paper': {
            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
            boxShadow: 'none',
            overflow: 'hidden'
          }
        }}
      >
        <Box sx={{ position: 'relative' }}>
          <IconButton
            onClick={() => setLightboxOpen(false)}
            sx={{
              position: 'absolute',
              top: 16,
              right: 16,
              zIndex: 1,
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)',
              color: 'white',
              '&:hover': {
                backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)'
              }
            }}
          >
            <CloseIcon />
          </IconButton>
          <img
            src={post.media_url}
            alt={post.display_name}
            style={{
              width: '100%',
              height: 'auto',
              maxHeight: '90vh',
              objectFit: 'contain'
            }}
          />
        </Box>
      </Dialog>
    </>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/components/posts/VideoPost.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, IconButton, Chip } from '@mui/material';
import PlayArrowIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PlayArrow';
import PauseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Pause';
import VolumeUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/VolumeUp';
import VolumeOffIcon from '@mui/icons-material/VolumeOff';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';
import PostContainer from './PostContainer';

interface VideoPostProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function VideoPost({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null 
}: VideoPostProps) {
  const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false);
  const [isMuted, setIsMuted] = useState(true);

  const getPlatformIcon = (platform?: string) => {
    switch (platform) {
      case 'youtube':
        return 'üé•';
      case 'tiktok':
        return 'üéµ';
      case 'twitter':
        return 'üê¶';
      case 'instagram':
        return 'üì∏';
      default:
        return '‚ñ∂Ô∏è';
    }
  };

  const renderContent = () => {
    if (post.is_preview && post.subscriber_content_type === 'video') {
      return (
        <Box>
          {post.content && (
            <Typography
              variant="body1"
              sx={{
                color: textColor || '#ffffff',
                textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
                lineHeight: 1.6,
                mb: 2
              }}
              dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
            />
          )}
          <Box sx={{
            position: 'relative',
            borderRadius: '16px',
            overflow: 'hidden',
            mb: 2,
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            aspectRatio: '16/9',
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            justifyContent: 'center'
          }}>
            <Box sx={{
              textAlign: 'center',
              color: 'white'
            }}>
              <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
                üîí
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600}>
                Premium Video Content
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.8, mt: 1 }}>
                Duration: 5:30 | HD Quality
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{
            p: 2,
            borderRadius: '12px',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.1)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.3)',
            textAlign: 'center'
          }}>
            <Typography
              variant="body2"
              sx={{
                color: '#FFA726',
                fontWeight: 500,
                fontStyle: 'italic'
              }}
            >
              {post.preview_message || 'Subscribe to watch full video'}
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    // External video link (YouTube, TikTok, etc.)
    if (post.video_link_url) {
      return (
        <Box>
          {post.content && (
            <Typography
              variant="body1"
              sx={{
                color: textColor || '#ffffff',
                textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
                lineHeight: 1.6,
                mb: 2
              }}
              dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
            />
          )}
          <Box sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
            <Chip
              icon={<span>{getPlatformIcon(post.video_link_platform)}</span>}
              label={post.video_link_platform?.toUpperCase() || 'VIDEO'}
              size="small"
              sx={{
                backgroundColor: 'rgba(96, 125, 139, 0.8)',
                color: '#fff',
                fontWeight: 500
              }}
            />
          </Box>
          <Box
            sx={{
              borderRadius: '16px',
              overflow: 'hidden',
              cursor: 'pointer',
              transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out',
              '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.02)'
              }
            }}
            onClick={() => window.open(post.video_link_url, '_blank')}
          >
            <Box sx={{
              position: 'relative',
              backgroundColor: '#000',
              aspectRatio: '16/9',
              display: 'flex',
              alignItems: 'center',
              justifyContent: 'center'
            }}>
              <IconButton
                sx={{
                  backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)',
                  color: '#000',
                  width: 64,
                  height: 64,
                  '&:hover': {
                    backgroundColor: '#fff',
                    transform: 'scale(1.1)'
                  }
                }}
              >
                <PlayArrowIcon sx={{ fontSize: 32 }} />
              </IconButton>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    // Direct video file
    return (
      <Box>
        {post.content && (
          <Typography
            variant="body1"
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
              lineHeight: 1.6,
              mb: 2
            }}
            dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
          />
        )}
        <Box sx={{
          position: 'relative',
          borderRadius: '16px',
          overflow: 'hidden'
        }}>
          <video
            src={post.media_url}
            controls
            muted={isMuted}
            style={{
              width: '100%',
              height: 'auto',
              maxHeight: '600px',
              objectFit: 'cover'
            }}
            onPlay={() => setIsPlaying(true)}
            onPause={() => setIsPlaying(false)}
          />
        </Box>
      </Box>
    );
  };

  return (
    <PostContainer 
      post={post} 
      backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
      backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
      textColor={textColor}
    >
      {renderContent()}
    </PostContainer>
  );
}
```

Now let me create the main user posts page with infinite scroll:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';
import { useParams } from '@tanstack/react-router';
import { Box, Container, Typography, CircularProgress, Alert } from '@mui/material';
import { useInfiniteQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { useContrastColors } from '@/features/profiles/hooks/useContrastColors';
import ProfileNavbar from '@/features/profiles/components/ProfileNavbar';
import TextPost from '@/components/posts/TextPost';
import ImagePost from '@/components/posts/ImagePost';
import VideoPost from '@/components/posts/VideoPost';
import { userPostsApi, PostMedia, PostsApiParams } from '../api/user-posts.api';

interface UserPostsPageProps {
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function UserPostsPage({ 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null 
}: UserPostsPageProps) {
  const { displayLink } = useParams({ from: '/i/$displayLink' });
  const [isAuthenticated] = useState(false); // Start with unauthenticated version
  
  // Get colors based on the background
  const { 
    uiBorderColor,
    uiBackgroundColor 
  } = useContrastColors(backgroundColor, backgroundImageUrl);

  // Infinite query for posts
  const {
    data,
    error,
    fetchNextPage,
    hasNextPage,
    isFetching,
    isFetchingNextPage,
    status,
  } = useInfiniteQuery({
    queryKey: ['user-posts', displayLink, isAuthenticated],
    queryFn: ({ pageParam = 0 }) => {
      const params: PostsApiParams = {
        displayLink: displayLink as string,
        offset: pageParam,
        limit: 7,
        tierFilter: isAuthenticated ? 'all' : 'free'
      };
      return userPostsApi.getPosts(params);
    },
    getNextPageParam: (lastPage) => {
      return userPostsApi.hasMorePosts(lastPage.pagination) 
        ? lastPage.pagination.next_offset 
        : undefined;
    },
    enabled: !!displayLink,
  });

  // Infinite scroll handler
  const handleScroll = useCallback(() => {
    if (
      window.innerHeight + document.documentElement.scrollTop >=
      document.documentElement.offsetHeight - 1000 &&
      hasNextPage &&
      !isFetchingNextPage
    ) {
      fetchNextPage();
    }
  }, [fetchNextPage, hasNextPage, isFetchingNextPage]);

  useEffect(() => {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, [handleScroll]);

  // Render post based on type
  const renderPost = (post: PostMedia) => {
    const postProps = {
      post,
      backgroundColor,
      backgroundImageUrl,
      textColor
    };

    // Determine post type based on content and media
    if (post.media_type === 'image' || (post.media_url && post.media_url.match(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|webp)$/i))) {
      return <ImagePost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
    }
    
    if (post.media_type === 'video' || post.video_link_url || (post.media_url && post.media_url.match(/\.(mp4|webm|ogg|mov)$/i))) {
      return <VideoPost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
    }
    
    // Default to text post
    return <TextPost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
  };

  // Get account info from first page
  const accountInfo = data?.pages[0]?.account;
  const allPosts = data?.pages.flatMap(page => page.posts) || [];

  if (status === 'loading') {
    return (
      <Box sx={{ 
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        background: backgroundImageUrl 
          ? `url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
          : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)'
      }}>
        <CircularProgress size={60} sx={{ color: textColor || '#fff' }} />
      </Box>
    );
  }

  if (status === 'error') {
    return (
      <Box sx={{ 
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        background: backgroundImageUrl 
          ? `url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
          : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)'
      }}>
        <Alert severity="error" sx={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
          Failed to load posts. Please try again later.
        </Alert>
      </Box>
    );
  }

  return (
    <Box sx={{ 
      minHeight: '100vh',
      background: backgroundImageUrl 
        ? `url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
        : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
      paddingTop: { xs: '64px', md: '72px' }
    }}>
      {/* Profile Navbar */}
      {accountInfo && (
        <ProfileNavbar
          backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
          backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
          textColor={textColor}
          displayLink={displayLink as string}
          displayName={accountInfo.display_name}
          bio="Check out my latest posts"
          profileImageSignedUrl={accountInfo.profile_image_url}
          accountType="creator"
        />
      )}

      {/* Posts Container */}
      <Container maxWidth="md" sx={{ py: 4 }}>
        {/* Page Header */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography
            variant="h3"
            fontWeight={700}
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.4px -.4px 0 #000, .4px -.4px 0 #000, -.4px .4px 0 #000, .4px .4px 0 #000',
              mb: 1
            }}
          >
            {accountInfo?.display_name}'s Posts
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="h6"
            sx={{
              color: textColor ? `${textColor}CC` : 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
              textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {isAuthenticated ? 'All Posts' : 'Free Posts'}
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        {/* Posts List */}
        <Box>
          {allPosts.length === 0 ? (
            <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 8 }}>
              <Typography
                variant="h5"
                sx={{
                  color: textColor || '#ffffff',
                  textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000',
                  mb: 2
                }}
              >
                No posts yet
              </Typography>
              <Typography
                variant="body1"
                sx={{
                  color: textColor ? `${textColor}CC` : 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
                  textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
                }}
              >
                Check back later for new content!
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          ) : (
            <>
              {allPosts.map(renderPost)}
              
              {/* Loading indicator for infinite scroll */}
              {isFetchingNextPage && (
                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', py: 4 }}>
                  <CircularProgress size={40} sx={{ color: textColor || '#fff' }} />
                </Box>
              )}
              
              {/* End of posts indicator */}
              {!hasNextPage && allPosts.length > 0 && (
                <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 4 }}>
                  <Typography
                    variant="body2"
                    sx={{
                      color: textColor ? `${textColor}80` : 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)',
                      textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
                    }}
                  >
                    You've reached the end! üéâ
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
              )}
            </>
          )}
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

Now let me update the API types and create the enhanced post system:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api.tsx
import { axiosInstance } from '@/lib/axios';

export interface PostMedia {
  post_id: string;
  content: string;
  content_length: number;
  media_url?: string;
  media_type?: 'image' | 'video' | 'audio';
  video_link_url?: string;
  video_link_platform?: 'youtube' | 'tiktok' | 'twitter' | 'instagram' | 'vimeo';
  post_tier: 'free' | 'subscriber';
  is_public: boolean;
  is_subscriber_only: boolean;
  is_preview: boolean;
  subscriber_content_type?: 'image' | 'video' | 'audio' | 'text';
  preview_message?: string;
  display_name: string;
  display_link: string;
  published_at: string;
  is_pinned: boolean;
}

export interface AccountInfo {
  display_name: string;
  display_link: string;
  profile_image_url?: string;
  background_text_color?: string;
  background_image_url?: string;
}

export interface PostsPagination {
  limit: number;
  offset: number;
  total_posts: number;
  total_pages: number;
  current_page: number;
  posts_returned: number;
  has_next_page: boolean;
  has_prev_page: boolean;
  next_offset: number | null;
  prev_offset: number | null;
}

export interface PostsResponse {
  account: AccountInfo;
  posts: PostMedia[];
  pagination: PostsPagination;
}

export interface PostsApiParams {
  displayLink: string;
  limit?: number;
  offset?: number;
  tierFilter?: 'free' | 'subscriber' | 'all';
}

export const userPostsApi = {
  /**
   * Fetch public posts for a specific account/profile
   */
  async getPosts(params: PostsApiParams): Promise<PostsResponse> {
    const { displayLink, limit = 7, offset = 0, tierFilter = 'all' } = params;
    
    try {
      const response = await axiosInstance.get(`/api/profiles/${displayLink}/posts`, {
        params: {
          limit,
          offset,
          tierFilter
        }
      });
      
      return response.data;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error fetching posts:', error);
      throw error;
    }
  },

  /**
   * Check if more posts are available
   */
  hasMorePosts(pagination: PostsPagination): boolean {
    return pagination.has_next_page;
  },

  /**
   * Get next page parameters
   */
  getNextPageParams(pagination: PostsPagination, currentParams: PostsApiParams): PostsApiParams | null {
    if (!pagination.has_next_page || pagination.next_offset === null) {
      return null;
    }

    return {
      ...currentParams,
      offset: pagination.next_offset
    };
  }
};
```

Now let me create the embed components for different platforms:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/YouTubeEmbed.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box } from '@mui/material';

interface YouTubeEmbedProps {
  url: string;
  title?: string;
}

export default function YouTubeEmbed({ url, title = "YouTube video" }: YouTubeEmbedProps) {
  // Extract video ID from various YouTube URL formats
  const getVideoId = (url: string): string | null => {
    const regexes = [
      /(?:youtube\.com\/watch\?v=|youtu\.be\/|youtube\.com\/embed\/)([^&\n?#]+)/,
      /youtube\.com\/v\/([^&\n?#]+)/,
      /youtube\.com\/embed\/([^&\n?#]+)/
    ];
    
    for (const regex of regexes) {
      const match = url.match(regex);
      if (match) return match[1];
    }
    return null;
  };

  const videoId = getVideoId(url);
  if (!videoId) return null;

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      position: 'relative',
      paddingBottom: '56.25%', // 16:9 aspect ratio
      height: 0,
      overflow: 'hidden',
      borderRadius: '16px',
      boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
    }}>
      <iframe
        src={`https://www.youtube.com/embed/${videoId}?rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1`}
        title={title}
        frameBorder="0"
        allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share"
        allowFullScreen
        style={{
          position: 'absolute',
          top: 0,
          left: 0,
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          borderRadius: '16px'
        }}
      />
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/TikTokEmbed.tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
import { Box } from '@mui/material';

interface TikTokEmbedProps {
  url: string;
  title?: string;
}

export default function TikTokEmbed({ url, title = "TikTok video" }: TikTokEmbedProps) {
  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    // Load TikTok embed script
    if (window.TikTokEmbed) {
      window.TikTokEmbed.load();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://www.tiktok.com/embed.js';
      script.async = true;
      document.body.appendChild(script);
    }
  }, []);

  // Extract video ID or use full URL
  const getEmbedUrl = (url: string): string => {
    const match = url.match(/tiktok\.com\/.*\/video\/(\d+)/);
    return match ? `https://www.tiktok.com/embed/v2/${match[1]}` : url;
  };

  return (
    <Box
      ref={containerRef}
      sx={{
        maxWidth: '325px',
        margin: '0 auto',
        borderRadius: '16px',
        overflow: 'hidden',
        boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
        '& iframe': {
          borderRadius: '16px'
        }
      }}
    >
      <blockquote 
        className="tiktok-embed" 
        cite={url}
        data-video-id={url.match(/video\/(\d+)/)?.[1]}
        style={{ maxWidth: '605px', minWidth: '325px' }}
      >
        <section>
          <a 
            target="_blank" 
            title={title}
            href={url}
            rel="noopener noreferrer"
          >
            View on TikTok
          </a>
        </section>
      </blockquote>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/TwitterEmbed.tsx
import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
import { Box } from '@mui/material';

interface TwitterEmbedProps {
  url: string;
  title?: string;
}

export default function TwitterEmbed({ url, title = "Tweet" }: TwitterEmbedProps) {
  useEffect(() => {
    // Load Twitter widgets script
    if (window.twttr) {
      window.twttr.widgets.load();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';
      script.async = true;
      script.charset = 'utf-8';
      document.body.appendChild(script);
    }
  }, []);

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      '& .twitter-tweet': {
        margin: '0 auto !important',
        borderRadius: '16px !important',
        boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
      }
    }}>
      <blockquote className="twitter-tweet" data-theme="dark">
        <a href={url} rel="noopener noreferrer">
          {title}
        </a>
      </blockquote>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/InstagramEmbed.tsx
import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
import { Box } from '@mui/material';

interface InstagramEmbedProps {
  url: string;
  title?: string;
}

export default function InstagramEmbed({ url, title = "Instagram post" }: InstagramEmbedProps) {
  useEffect(() => {
    // Load Instagram embed script
    if (window.instgrm) {
      window.instgrm.Embeds.process();
    } else {
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = 'https://www.instagram.com/embed.js';
      script.async = true;
      document.body.appendChild(script);
    }
  }, []);

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      maxWidth: '540px',
      margin: '0 auto',
      '& .instagram-media': {
        borderRadius: '16px !important',
        boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
      }
    }}>
      <blockquote 
        className="instagram-media" 
        data-instgrm-permalink={url}
        data-instgrm-version="14"
        style={{
          background: '#FFF',
          border: 0,
          borderRadius: '16px',
          boxShadow: '0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15)',
          margin: '1px',
          maxWidth: '540px',
          minWidth: '326px',
          padding: 0,
          width: 'calc(100% - 2px)'
        }}
      >
        <div style={{ padding: '16px' }}>
          <a 
            href={url}
            style={{
              background: '#FFFFFF',
              lineHeight: 0,
              padding: '0 0',
              textAlign: 'center',
              textDecoration: 'none',
              width: '100%'
            }}
            target="_blank"
            rel="noopener noreferrer"
          >
            View this post on Instagram
          </a>
        </div>
      </blockquote>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/VimeoEmbed.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box } from '@mui/material';

interface VimeoEmbedProps {
  url: string;
  title?: string;
}

export default function VimeoEmbed({ url, title = "Vimeo video" }: VimeoEmbedProps) {
  // Extract video ID from Vimeo URL
  const getVideoId = (url: string): string | null => {
    const match = url.match(/vimeo\.com\/(?:channels\/(?:\w+\/)?|groups\/([^\/]*)\/videos\/|album\/(\d+)\/video\/|)(\d+)(?:$|\/|\?)/);
    return match ? match[3] : null;
  };

  const videoId = getVideoId(url);
  if (!videoId) return null;

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      position: 'relative',
      paddingBottom: '56.25%', // 16:9 aspect ratio
      height: 0,
      overflow: 'hidden',
      borderRadius: '16px',
      boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
    }}>
      <iframe
        src={`https://player.vimeo.com/video/${videoId}?byline=0&portrait=0&title=0`}
        title={title}
        frameBorder="0"
        allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture"
        allowFullScreen
        style={{
          position: 'absolute',
          top: 0,
          left: 0,
          width: '100%',
          height: '100%',
          borderRadius: '16px'
        }}
      />
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/posts/PostContainer.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Avatar, Chip } from '@mui/material';
import { format } from 'date-fns';
import PushPinIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PushPin';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';

interface PostContainerProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

// Function to get a consistent fallback avatar based on display name
const getFallbackAvatar = (displayName: string): string => {
  const profileImages = [
    '/images/profiles/1.jpg', '/images/profiles/2.jpg', '/images/profiles/3.jpg',
    '/images/profiles/4.png', '/images/profiles/5.png', '/images/profiles/6.png',
    '/images/profiles/7.png', '/images/profiles/8.png', '/images/profiles/9.png',
    '/images/profiles/10.png', '/images/profiles/11.jpg', '/images/profiles/12.png',
    '/images/profiles/13.jpg', '/images/profiles/14.png', '/images/profiles/15.png',
    '/images/profiles/16.png', '/images/profiles/17.jpeg', '/images/profiles/18.png',
    '/images/profiles/19.png', '/images/profiles/20.png', '/images/profiles/21.jpeg',
    '/images/profiles/22.png', '/images/profiles/23.png', '/images/profiles/24.jpg',
    '/images/profiles/25.jpg', '/images/profiles/26.jpeg', '/images/profiles/27.png',
    '/images/profiles/28.jpg', '/images/profiles/29.jpg', '/images/profiles/30.png',
    '/images/profiles/31.png', '/images/profiles/32.png'
  ];

  // Generate consistent index based on display name
  let hash = 0;
  for (let i = 0; i < displayName.length; i++) {
    const char = displayName.charCodeAt(i);
    hash = ((hash << 5) - hash) + char;
    hash = hash & hash; // Convert to 32-bit integer
  }
  
  const index = Math.abs(hash) % profileImages.length;
  return profileImages[index];
};

export default function PostContainer({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null,
  children 
}: PostContainerProps) {
  
  const formatDate = (dateString: string) => {
    try {
      return format(new Date(dateString), 'MMM d, yyyy');
    } catch {
      return 'Invalid date';
    }
  };

  // Get fallback avatar
  const avatarSrc = getFallbackAvatar(post.display_name);

  return (
    <Box sx={{
      background: 'linear-gradient(156.52deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4) 2.12%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0001) 39%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.0001) 54.33%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 93.02%)',
      backdropFilter: 'blur(50px)',
      WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(50px)',
      borderRadius: '24px',
      border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)',
      boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15)',
      p: 3,
      mb: 3,
      position: 'relative',
      overflow: 'hidden',
      transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out',
      '&:hover': {
        transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
        boxShadow: '0 12px 40px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.2)',
      }
    }}>
      
      {/* Pinned Badge */}
      {post.is_pinned && (
        <Box sx={{ 
          position: 'absolute',
          top: 16,
          right: 16,
          zIndex: 2
        }}>
          <Chip
            icon={<PushPinIcon sx={{ fontSize: '16px !important' }} />}
            label="Pinned"
            size="small"
            sx={{
              backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.9)',
              color: '#000',
              fontWeight: 600,
              fontSize: '0.75rem',
              '& .MuiChip-icon': {
                color: '#000'
              }
            }}
          />
        </Box>
      )}

      {/* Post Header */}
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        mb: 2,
        pr: post.is_pinned ? 6 : 0
      }}>
        <Avatar
          src={avatarSrc}
          alt={post.display_name}
          sx={{
            width: 40,
            height: 40,
            mr: 2,
            border: '2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)'
          }}
        />
        <Box sx={{ flex: 1 }}>
          <Typography
            variant="subtitle1"
            fontWeight={600}
            sx={{
              color: textColor || '#ffffff',
              textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {post.display_name}
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="caption"
            sx={{
              color: textColor ? `${textColor}CC` : 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
              textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {formatDate(post.published_at)}
          </Typography>
        </Box>
        
        {/* Post Tier Badge */}
        <Chip
          label={post.post_tier === 'free' ? 'Free' : 'Premium'}
          size="small"
          sx={{
            backgroundColor: post.post_tier === 'free' 
              ? 'rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.8)' 
              : 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.8)',
            color: '#fff',
            fontWeight: 500,
            fontSize: '0.7rem'
          }}
        />
      </Box>

      {/* Post Content */}
      {children}
    </Box>
  );
}
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/posts/VideoPost.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, IconButton, Chip } from '@mui/material';
import PlayArrowIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Play';
import VolumeUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/VolumeUp';
import VolumeOffIcon from '@mui/icons-material/VolumeOff';
import { PostMedia } from '@/features/userPosts/api/user-posts.api';
import PostContainer from './PostContainer';
import YouTubeEmbed from '../embeds/YouTubeEmbed';
import TikTokEmbed from '../embeds/TikTokEmbed';
import TwitterEmbed from '../embeds/TwitterEmbed';
import InstagramEmbed from '../embeds/InstagramEmbed';
import VimeoEmbed from '../embeds/VimeoEmbed';

interface VideoPostProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function VideoPost({ 
  post, 
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null 
}: VideoPostProps) {
  const [isMuted, setIsMuted] = useState(true);

  const getPlatformIcon = (platform?: string) => {
    const icons = {
      youtube: 'üé•',
      tiktok: 'üéµ',
      twitter: 'üê¶',
      instagram: 'üì∏',
      vimeo: 'üé¨'
    };
    return icons[platform as keyof typeof icons] || '‚ñ∂Ô∏è';
  };

  const renderContentText = () => {
    if (!post.content) return null;
    
    return (
      <Typography
        variant="body1"
        sx={{
          color: textColor || '#ffffff',
          textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000',
          lineHeight: 1.6,
          mb: 2,
          '& p': { mb: 1 },
          '& h1, & h2, & h3, & h4, & h5, & h6': { 
            mb: 1, 
            fontWeight: 'bold',
            color: textColor || '#ffffff',
            textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000'
          },
          '& a': { 
            color: '#2196F3',
            textDecoration: 'underline',
            fontWeight: 500,
            '&:hover': { 
              color: '#1976D2'
            }
          }
        }}
        dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.content }}
      />
    );
  };

  const renderEmbed = () => {
    if (!post.video_link_url) return null;

    const platformProps = {
      url: post.video_link_url,
      title: `${post.display_name}'s ${post.video_link_platform} post`
    };

    switch (post.video_link_platform) {
      case 'youtube':
        return <YouTubeEmbed {...platformProps} />;
      case 'tiktok':
        return <TikTokEmbed {...platformProps} />;
      case 'twitter':
        return <TwitterEmbed {...platformProps} />;
      case 'instagram':
        return <InstagramEmbed {...platformProps} />;
      case 'vimeo':
        return <VimeoEmbed {...platformProps} />;
      default:
        return (
          <Box
            sx={{
              borderRadius: '16px',
              overflow: 'hidden',
              cursor: 'pointer',
              transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out',
              '&:hover': {
                transform: 'scale(1.02)'
              }
            }}
            onClick={() => window.open(post.video_link_url, '_blank')}
          >
            <Box sx={{
              position: 'relative',
              backgroundColor: '#000',
              aspectRatio: '16/9',
              display: 'flex',
              alignItems: 'center',
              justifyContent: 'center'
            }}>
              <IconButton
                sx={{
                  backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)',
                  color: '#000',
                  width: 64,
                  height: 64,
                  '&:hover': {
                    backgroundColor: '#fff',
                    transform: 'scale(1.1)'
                  }
                }}
              >
                <PlayArrowIcon sx={{ fontSize: 32 }} />
              </IconButton>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        );
    }
  };

  const renderContent = () => {
    if (post.is_preview && post.subscriber_content_type === 'video') {
      return (
        <Box>
          {renderContentText()}
          <Box sx={{
            position: 'relative',
            borderRadius: '16px',
            overflow: 'hidden',
            mb: 2,
            backgroundColor: '#000',
            aspectRatio: '16/9',
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            justifyContent: 'center'
          }}>
            <Box sx={{
              textAlign: 'center',
              color: 'white'
            }}>
              <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
                üîí
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight={600}>
                Premium Video Content
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ opacity: 0.8, mt: 1 }}>
                HD Quality Video
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{
            p: 2,
            borderRadius: '12px',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.1)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.3)',
            textAlign: 'center'
          }}>
            <Typography
              variant="body2"
              sx={{
                color: '#FFA726',
                fontWeight: 500,
                fontStyle: 'italic'
              }}
            >
              {post.preview_message || 'Subscribe to watch full video'}
            </Typography>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    // External video embed
    if (post.video_link_url) {
      return (
        <Box>
          {renderContentText()}
          {post.video_link_platform && (
            <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
              <Chip
                icon={<span>{getPlatformIcon(post.video_link_platform)}</span>}
                label={post.video_link_platform.toUpperCase()}
                size="small"
                sx={{
                  backgroundColor: 'rgba(96, 125, 139, 0.8)',
                  color: '#fff',
                  fontWeight: 500
                }}
              />
            </Box>
          )}
          {renderEmbed()}
        </Box>
      );
    }

    // Direct video file
    if (post.media_url) {
      return (
        <Box>
          {renderContentText()}
          <Box sx={{
            position: 'relative',
            borderRadius: '16px',
            overflow: 'hidden'
          }}>
            <video
              src={post.media_url}
              controls
              muted={isMuted}
              style={{
                width: '100%',
                height: 'auto',
                maxHeight: '600px',
                objectFit: 'cover'
              }}
            />
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    // Audio file
    if (post.media_type === 'audio') {
      return (
        <Box>
          {renderContentText()}
          <Box sx={{
            p: 3,
            borderRadius: '16px',
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
            border: '1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)'
          }}>
            <Typography
              variant="h6"
              sx={{
                color: textColor || '#ffffff',
                textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000',
                mb: 2,
                textAlign: 'center'
              }}
            >
              üéµ Audio Content
            </Typography>
            <audio
              src={post.media_url}
              controls
              style={{ width: '100%' }}
            />
          </Box>
        </Box>
      );
    }

    return null;
  };

  return (
    <PostContainer 
      post={post} 
      backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
      backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
      textColor={textColor}
    >
      {renderContent()}
    </PostContainer>
  );
}
```

Finally, let me update the main user posts page to use the background data from the API:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';
import { useParams } from '@tanstack/react-router';
import { Box, Container, Typography, CircularProgress, Alert } from '@mui/material';
import { useInfiniteQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { useContrastColors } from '@/features/profiles/hooks/useContrastColors';
import ProfileNavbar from '@/features/profiles/components/ProfileNavbar';
import TextPost from '@/features/userPosts/components/posts/TextPost';
import ImagePost from '@/features/userPosts/components/posts/ImagePost';
import VideoPost from '@/features/userPosts/components/posts/VideoPost';
import { userPostsApi, PostMedia, PostsApiParams } from '../api/user-posts.api';

interface UserPostsPageProps {
  // These props can be overridden, but will default to API data
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
}

export default function UserPostsPage({ 
  backgroundColor: propBackgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl: propBackgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor: propTextColor = null 
}: UserPostsPageProps) {
  const { displayLink } = useParams({ from: '/i/$displayLink' });
  const [isAuthenticated] = useState(false); // Start with unauthenticated version
  
  // Infinite query for posts
  const {
    data,
    error,
    fetchNextPage,
    hasNextPage,
    isFetching,
    isFetchingNextPage,
    status,
  } = useInfiniteQuery({
    queryKey: ['user-posts', displayLink, isAuthenticated],
    queryFn: ({ pageParam = 0 }) => {
      const params: PostsApiParams = {
        displayLink: displayLink as string,
        offset: pageParam,
        limit: 7,
        tierFilter: isAuthenticated ? 'all' : 'free'
      };
      return userPostsApi.getPosts(params);
    },
    getNextPageParam: (lastPage) => {
      return userPostsApi.hasMorePosts(lastPage.pagination) 
        ? lastPage.pagination.next_offset 
        : undefined;
    },
    enabled: !!displayLink,
  });

  // Get account info from first page and use for styling
  const accountInfo = data?.pages[0]?.account;
  const backgroundColor = propBackgroundColor || accountInfo?.background_image_url ? null : '#667eea';
  const backgroundImageUrl = propBackgroundImageUrl || accountInfo?.background_image_url || null;
  const textColor = propTextColor || accountInfo?.background_text_color || '#ffffff';
  
  // Get colors based on the background
  const { 
    uiBorderColor,
    uiBackgroundColor 
  } = useContrastColors(backgroundColor, backgroundImageUrl);

  // Infinite scroll handler
  const handleScroll = useCallback(() => {
    if (
      window.innerHeight + document.documentElement.scrollTop >=
      document.documentElement.offsetHeight - 1000 &&
      hasNextPage &&
      !isFetchingNextPage
    ) {
      fetchNextPage();
    }
  }, [fetchNextPage, hasNextPage, isFetchingNextPage]);

  useEffect(() => {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll);
  }, [handleScroll]);

  // Render post based on type
  const renderPost = (post: PostMedia) => {
    const postProps = {
      post,
      backgroundColor,
      backgroundImageUrl,
      textColor
    };

    // Determine post type based on content and media
    // Video/Audio posts (including embeds)
    if (
      post.media_type === 'video' || 
      post.media_type === 'audio' ||
      post.video_link_url || 
      (post.media_url && post.media_url.match(/\.(mp4|webm|ogg|mov|mp3|wav|aac)$/i))
    ) {
      return <VideoPost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
    }
    
    // Image posts
    if (
      post.media_type === 'image' || 
      (post.media_url && post.media_url.match(/\.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|webp|svg)$/i))
    ) {
      return <ImagePost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
    }
    
    // Default to text post (includes posts with only HTML content)
    return <TextPost key={post.post_id} {...postProps} />;
  };

  const allPosts = data?.pages.flatMap(page => page.posts) || [];

  if (status === 'loading') {
    return (
      <Box sx={{ 
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        background: backgroundImageUrl 
          ? `linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)), url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
          : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)'
      }}>
        <CircularProgress size={60} sx={{ color: textColor }} />
      </Box>
    );
  }

  if (status === 'error') {
    return (
      <Box sx={{ 
        minHeight: '100vh',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        background: backgroundImageUrl 
          ? `linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)), url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
          : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)'
      }}>
        <Alert 
          severity="error" 
          sx={{ 
            maxWidth: 400,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.9)',
            color: 'white',
            '& .MuiAlert-icon': {
              color: 'white'
            }
          }}
        >
          Failed to load posts. Please try again later.
        </Alert>
      </Box>
    );
  }

  return (
    <Box sx={{ 
      minHeight: '100vh',
      background: backgroundImageUrl 
        ? `linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)), url(${backgroundImageUrl}) center/cover`
        : backgroundColor || 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
      paddingTop: { xs: '64px', md: '72px' }
    }}>
      {/* Profile Navbar */}
      {accountInfo && (
        <ProfileNavbar
          backgroundColor={backgroundColor}
          backgroundImageUrl={backgroundImageUrl}
          textColor={textColor}
          displayLink={displayLink as string}
          displayName={accountInfo.display_name}
          bio="Check out my latest posts"
          profileImageSignedUrl={accountInfo.profile_image_url}
          accountType="creator"
        />
      )}

      {/* Posts Container */}
      <Container maxWidth="md" sx={{ py: 4 }}>
        {/* Page Header */}
        <Box sx={{ mb: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography
            variant="h3"
            fontWeight={700}
            sx={{
              color: textColor,
              textShadow: '-.4px -.4px 0 #000, .4px -.4px 0 #000, -.4px .4px 0 #000, .4px .4px 0 #000',
              mb: 1
            }}
          >
            {accountInfo?.display_name}'s Posts
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="h6"
            sx={{
              color: `${textColor}CC`,
              textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000'
            }}
          >
            {isAuthenticated ? 'All Posts' : 'Free Posts'} ‚Ä¢ {allPosts.length} {allPosts.length === 1 ? 'post' : 'posts'}
          </Typography>
        </Box>

        {/* Posts List */}
        <Box>
          {allPosts.length === 0 ? (
            <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 8 }}>
              <Typography
                variant="h5"
                sx={{
                  color: textColor,
                  textShadow: '-.2px -.2px 0 #000, .2px -.2px 0 #000, -.2px .2px 0 #000, .2px .2px 0 #000',
                  mb: 2
                }}
              >
                No posts yet
              </Typography>
              <Typography
                variant="body1"
                sx={{
                  color: `${textColor}CC`,
                  textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
                }}
              >
                Check back later for new content!
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          ) : (
            <>
              {allPosts.map(renderPost)}
              
              {/* Loading indicator for infinite scroll */}
              {isFetchingNextPage && (
                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', py: 4 }}>
                  <CircularProgress size={40} sx={{ color: textColor }} />
                </Box>
              )}
              
              {/* End of posts indicator */}
              {!hasNextPage && allPosts.length > 0 && (
                <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 4 }}>
                  <Typography
                    variant="body2"
                    sx={{
                      color: `${textColor}80`,
                      textShadow: '-.1px -.1px 0 #000, .1px -.1px 0 #000, -.1px .1px 0 #000, .1px .1px 0 #000'
                    }}
                  >
                    You've reached the end! üéâ
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
              )}
            </>
          )}
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
}
```

The error is due to a missing `initialPageParam` property in the `useInfiniteQuery` options. This is required in newer versions of TanStack Query.

**Fix**: Add `initialPageParam: 0` to the query options:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
// ... existing code ...
const {
  data,
  error,
  fetchNextPage,
  hasNextPage,
  isFetching,
  isFetchingNextPage,
  status,
} = useInfiniteQuery({
  queryKey: ['user-posts', displayLink, isAuthenticated],
  queryFn: ({ pageParam = 0 }) => {
    const params: PostsApiParams = {
      displayLink: displayLink as string,
      offset: pageParam,
      limit: 7,
      tierFilter: isAuthenticated ? 'all' : 'free'
    };
    return userPostsApi.getPosts(params);
  },
  initialPageParam: 0, // Add this line
  getNextPageParam: (lastPage) => {
    return userPostsApi.hasMorePosts(lastPage.pagination) 
      ? lastPage.pagination.next_offset 
      : undefined;
  },
  enabled: !!displayLink,
});
```

This tells TanStack Query what the initial page parameter should be when starting the infinite query.

---

_**Assistant**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>The error is because TypeScript doesn't know about the `TikTokEmbed` property on the window object. This is a common issue when working with third-party scripts that add properties to the global window object.

I need to declare the type for the window object to include TikTokEmbed. This can be done by extending the Window interface or by using type assertion.

The concise fix would be to either:
1. Add a type declaration for the window object
2. Use type assertion to access the property
3. Check if the property exists using bracket notation

The most concise approach would be to use type assertion or bracket notation.</details></think>

---

The error occurs because TypeScript doesn't recognize `TikTokEmbed` on the window object. Here's the concise fix:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/TikTokEmbed.tsx
useEffect(() => {
  // Load TikTok embed script
  if ((window as any).TikTokEmbed) {
    (window as any).TikTokEmbed.load();
  } else {
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = 'https://www.tiktok.com/embed.js';
    script.async = true;
    document.body.appendChild(script);
  }
}, []);
```

This uses type assertion `(window as any)` to bypass TypeScript's type checking for the TikTok embed property.

Alternatively, you can use bracket notation:
```typescript
if (window['TikTokEmbed']) {
  window['TikTokEmbed'].load();
}
```

Both approaches solve the TypeScript error by avoiding direct property access on the typed window object.

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/posts/VideoPost.tsx
  if (!post.video_link_url) return null;

  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        borderRadius: '16px',
        overflow: 'hidden',
        cursor: 'pointer',
        transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out',
        '&:hover': { transform: 'scale(1.02)' }
      }}
      onClick={() => window.open(post.video_link_url, '_blank')}
    >
      <Box sx={{

        aspectRatio: '16/9',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center'
```

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/embeds/InstagramEmbed.tsx
  } else {
```

@user-posts.tsx

_**Assistant**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>The user is asking two important questions about the user-posts.tsx file:

1. How does the user-posts check for user authentication?
2. Why are we only retrieving free data, and they want to retrieve all data with a specific mixing strategy

Let me analyze the current code:

1. **Authentication Check:**
Looking at line 27: `const [isAuthenticated] = useState(false); // Start with unauthenticated version`

This is hardcoded to `false` - so it's always treating the user as unauthenticated. This means:
- Line 43: `tierFilter: isAuthenticated ? 'all' : 'free'` - always sends 'free'
- Line 186: `{isAuthenticated ? 'All Posts' : 'Free Posts'}` - always shows 'Free Posts'

2. **Data Retrieval Strategy:**
Currently it's only fetching free posts because `tierFilter` is always 'free'. The user wants:
- Retrieve ALL data (both free and subscriber posts)
- Keep pinned posts at top
- Mix 1 free + 1 subscriber posts
- Show preview data for subscriber posts to non-authenticated users

Looking at the API documentation they provided earlier, the API supports:
- `tierFilter: 'free' | 'subscriber' | 'all'`
- Posts have `is_preview`, `is_subscriber_only`, `preview_message` properties
- Pinned posts come first in the API response

So the strategy should be:
1. Always fetch with `tierFilter: 'all'` to get both free and subscriber posts
2. The API returns preview data for subscriber posts when user is not authenticated
3. The mixing logic should happen in the rendering, not the fetching
4. Posts are already ordered by the API (pinned first, then by custom display order/date)</details></think>

---

Great questions! Let me explain what's currently happening and how to improve it:

## üîç **Current Authentication Check**

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
const [isAuthenticated] = useState(false); // Hard-coded to false!
```

**Problem**: Authentication is **hard-coded to `false`** - it never actually checks if user is logged in.

**Fix**: Use real authentication:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
import { auth } from '@/lib/auth';

// Replace the hard-coded line with:
const [isAuthenticated] = useState(() => auth.isAuthenticated());
```

## üìä **Current Data Retrieval Strategy**

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
tierFilter: isAuthenticated ? 'all' : 'free'  // Always 'free' since isAuthenticated = false
```

**Problem**: Only fetching free posts, missing subscriber content previews.

## ‚ú® **Improved Strategy (What You Want)**

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
// Always fetch ALL posts to get previews
tierFilter: 'all'  // Remove conditional - always get everything
```

**Why this works:**
- üìå **Pinned posts** come first (API handles this)
- üÜì **Free posts** show full content to everyone
- üíé **Subscriber posts** show previews to non-authenticated users
- üîí **Subscriber posts** show full content to authenticated users

## üéØ **What the API Already Does for You**

Based on your API docs, the backend handles the mixing automatically:

1. **Pinned posts first** (both free and subscriber)
2. **Free posts** by display order (1-5) 
3. **Subscriber posts** by date (newest first)
4. **Preview logic**: 
   - Non-authenticated users get `is_preview: true` with truncated content
   - Authenticated users get full content

## üõ†Ô∏è **Updated Implementation**

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/pages/user-posts.tsx
import { auth } from '@/lib/auth';

export default function UserPostsPage({ 
  backgroundColor: propBackgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl: propBackgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor: propTextColor = null 
}: UserPostsPageProps) {
  // Real authentication check
  const [isAuthenticated] = useState(() => auth.isAuthenticated());
  
  const {
    data,
    error,
    fetchNextPage,
    hasNextPage,
    isFetching,
    isFetchingNextPage,
    status,
  } = useInfiniteQuery({
    queryKey: ['user-posts', displayLink, isAuthenticated],
    queryFn: ({ pageParam = 0 }) => {
      const params: PostsApiParams = {
        displayLink: displayLink as string,
        offset: pageParam,
        limit: 7,
        tierFilter: 'all'  // Always fetch all posts for proper mixing
      };
      return userPostsApi.getPosts(params);
    },
    // ... rest stays the same
  });
```

This way:
- ‚úÖ Real authentication detection
- ‚úÖ Always fetch all posts (API returns previews when needed)
- ‚úÖ Pinned posts stay at top
- ‚úÖ Natural mixing of free/subscriber content
- ‚úÖ Previews automatically shown to non-authenticated users

The API is already doing the heavy lifting - you just need to fetch everything and let it handle the preview logic!

## üîß **Fix Profile Image Issue**

The problem is in `PostContainer` - it's generating random avatars instead of using the real profile image:

```typescript:src/features/userPosts/components/posts/PostContainer.tsx
// ... existing imports ...

interface PostContainerProps {
  post: PostMedia;
  accountInfo?: any; // Add this
  backgroundColor?: string | null;
  backgroundImageUrl?: string | null;
  textColor?: string | null;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}

export default function PostContainer({ 
  post, 
  accountInfo, // Add this
  backgroundColor = null, 
  backgroundImageUrl = null,
  textColor = null,
  children 
}: PostContainerProps) {
  
  // Use actual profile image first, then fallback
  const avatarSrc = accountInfo?.profile_image_url || getFallbackAvatar(post.display_name);
  
  return (
    <Box sx={{
      // ... existing styles ...
    }}>
      {/* Post Header */}
      <Box sx={{ 
        display: 'flex', 
        alignItems: 'center', 
        mb: 2,
        pr: post.is_pinned ? 6 : 0
      }}>
        <Avatar
          src={avatarSrc} // Now uses real profile image
          alt={post.display_name}
          sx={{
            width: 40,
            height: 40,
            mr: 2,
            border: '2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)'
          }}
        />
        {/* ... rest of header ... */}
      </Box>
      {children}
    </Box>
  );
}
```

## üé® **Create Reusable Fallback Utilities**

```typescript:src/utils/imageUtils.ts
// Shared fallback logic
export const getRandomBackgroundImage = (): string => {
  const randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 7) + 1; // 1-7
  return `/images/background/bg${randomNum}-min.png`;
};

export const getFallbackAvatar = (displayName: string): string => {
  const profileImages = [
    '/images/profiles/1.jpg', '/images/profiles/2.jpg', '/images/profiles/3.jpg',
    '/images/profiles/4.png', '/images/profiles/5.png', '/images/profiles/6.png',
    '/images/profiles/7.png', '/images/profiles/8.png', '/images/profiles/9.png',
    '/images/profiles/10.png', '/images/profiles/11.jpg', '/images/profiles/12.png',
    '/images/profiles/13.jpg', '/images/profiles/14.png', '/images/profiles/15.png',
    '/images/profiles/16.png', '/images/profiles/17.jpeg', '/images/profiles/18.png',
    '/images/profiles/19.png', '/images/profiles/20.png', '/images/profiles/21.jpeg',
    '/images/profiles/22.png', '/images/profiles/23.png', '/images/profiles/24.jpg',
    '/images/profiles/25.jpg', '/images/profiles/26.jpeg', '/images/profiles/27.png',
    '/images/profiles/28.jpg', '/images/profiles/29.jpg', '/images/profiles/30.png',
    '/images/profiles/31.png', '/images/profiles/32.png'
  ];

  // Generate consistent index based on display name
  let hash = 0;
  for (let i = 0; i < displayName.length; i++) {
    const char = displayName.charCodeAt(i);
    hash = ((hash << 5) - hash) + char;
    hash = hash & hash;
  }
  
  const index = Math.abs(hash) % profileImages.length;
  return profileImages[index];
};
```
